setting.name: log-level
setting.label: Bridge log level
setting.description: Maximum log severity level to be recorded.

setting.name: sip-log-level
setting.label: Debug SIP Stack
setting.description: If set SIP stack debug output will be turned on.

setting.name: max-legs
setting.label: Maximum legs
setting.description: The maximum number of call legs to be allowed by this bridge. 0 means unlimited.

setting.name: sip-domain
setting.label: Conference Server SIP domain
setting.description: The host parts of the SIP URI of the conference server.

setting.name: sip-proxy
setting.label: SIP Outbound Proxy
setting.description: An 'outbound proxy' that should be used as the first hop in any request originated from the bridge.

setting.name: sip-aliases
setting.description: A comma separated list of host and/or host:port values that the bridge should accept as references to itself (in addition to the SIP DOMAIN value)

setting.name: mute
setting.label: Mute code
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a conference participant to toggle the 'mute' of input from thier own call leg.

setting.name: deaf-mute
setting.label: Deaf mute code
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a conference participant to toggle the 'mute' of thier own call leg in both directions.

setting.name: up
setting.label: Energy UP
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to bump up minimal voice energy level.

setting.name: reset
setting.label: Energy EQU
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to reset minimal voice energy level.

setting.name: down
setting.label: Energy DOWN
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to turn down minimal voice energy level.

setting.name: up
setting.label: Volume UP
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to bump up the volume.

setting.name: reset
setting.label: Volume RESET
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to reset the volume level.

setting.name: down
setting.label: Volume DOWN
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to turn down the volume.

setting.name: up
setting.label: Talk vol. UP
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to bump up microphone sensitivity (=his talk volume).

setting.name: reset
setting.label: Talk vol. RESET
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to reset microphone sensitivity.

setting.name: down
setting.label: Talk vol. DOWN
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to turn down microphone sensitivity.

setting.name: hungup
setting.label: Hungup code
setting.description: The DTMF sequence to be entered by a participant to leave the conference.
